ygData.subject: Concert Hall
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail fello song brothers and sisters, I was looking at the list of instruments and songs from the concert hall, and I saw some info that concerdicted the song
ygData.messageBody:
Hail fello song brothers and sisters,

I was looking at the list of instruments and songs from the concert hall, and I saw some info that concerdicted the song and instrument list from this site. I was wondering if any of you have tested the following songs and instruments, and know which site is correct.

song: Denon's Desparate Dirge, Lev 43, this site says damage is 311+(lev-43)*2 making MAX dame at Lev 50 only 325, and does not say anything about mana; CH says it does 275 dam and requires 800mana?

Instrument: Mistmore battle drums: this site says +20%; CH says +25%

Instrument: Lute of the gypsy princes: this site says no effect; CH says +5%

Was just wondering if anyone can conferm which site is correct? I am only Lev 22, with no unique instruments, so can not test them, but I am on Bristlebane and if any of you High Lev Bards on Bristlebane can give me or help me obtain the MM Drum and Princes Lute, I will be more then happy to both Pay for the Item and Test them! HEHE HAHA *LOL*

Clukey Lryicweaver, Bristlebane, 22nd Song
